parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the client.

*   **aliyun_assist**: Cloud Assistant client
*   **aliyun_monitor**: CloudMonitor client

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description: The UUID of the server. If you specify multiple UUIDs, separate the UUIDs with commas (,).
